summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, authorizing the acquisition of real property commonly known as 1126 North 98th Street and 1133 North 100th Street in Seattle, Washington, for electric system purposes; amending the 2010 Adopted Budget by transferring existing appropriations between budget control levels; adding a new project and revising project allocations for certain projects in the 2010-2015 CIP; authorizing the acceptance of the deed; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
